channel.title: Programmer for Hire?
channel.description:
Can anyone give me the address of the website that allows you to post requests for work to be done that anyone can see for free?
I dont care if anyone flames me, but when it comes down to it, the only way I see of getting a new wave of autoing through means of a "bot" is to pay either one individual, or a group to do the work.
Im going to be posting a job offer for anyone that can produce a "Java-Based" bot, and trust me, im very serious about getting a new bot out, and im looking to post a final listing price of somewhere in the range of $1500 - $2000 USD (if more, then I will play it by year) as I have plans to make this back, while helping the cheating community.
I cant do this myself, ill admit, im horrible at any type of programming, so I will not be doing any of the coding whatsoever, I will simply be the "bank" behind the operation.
Upon having this completed, I will be opening up a small community for use with this bot. I know, this will take a while, I dont care how long it takes, as long as it gets done. I want to be a part of the future for the cheating scene concerning Runescape, and if this is what it takes, then so be it.
And lets face it, if someone did this, I would be paying them to use their bot, so I might as well try to get the ball rolling, who knows what will happen.
Discuss here if you like.

item.title: Programmer for Hire?
item.dc:creator: @hdkilla HDKilla
item.description:
@hdkilla wrote:

Could I please have a user with the option to close this topic to do so please?

I have found my programmer, and you will all be getting news of something big soon…

Read full topic

item.title: Programmer for Hire?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“newbiehacker, post:33, topic:3007”]because what has scripting got to do with java?

and also why the fuck would they want a shitload of even more whiny little noobs leeching of their work?[/quote]

I agree…

Personally, if I had any skill in java at all (which I do not,) and was able to deob the client, I definetly wouldn’t relaese it here… Maybe I would post a site in the CM section inviting people, or just PM the people I would like in my community, but I definetly would not want another Aryan.

Aryan brought so many leechers it wasn’t even funny, and it changed the cheating community forever (in a non-positive way.)

If I ever made such a thing, I would not release it to the public, all you guys make it sound like its so easy, and we need a new ‘Aryan’ to continue cheating. Read up on some History… <3Mad cow, PaulT<3

Read full topic

[/quote]

Sorta = opaque predicates removed and compilable code, but nothing done about that random method(?)/field shuffling.

hdkiller = raw?

Lol, no, ive always had the same nick since I started on Kait’s.

And it should be HDKilla, but I dont know why the caps didnt come up…
[/quote]

My caps are fine

Just don’t pretend to hire one and don’t actually make one ;)[/quote]

I wasnt saying that you spelt it wrong (but you did hdkill"er", its HDKill"a"), I was saying that when I registered it didnt put my name in the proper cap’s.

And believe me, I wouldnt invest all this money to screw around with anyone.
